room_title: Escape room "Mission's Breakout: the Ultimate Bank Heist" by Mission Escape Games in Los Angeles
review: My first time doing an escape room and it was awesome! My friends and I did the Bank Heist, its a new room with clever and challenging puzzles. The staff was also great, Bri was our host and she helped to create a fun atmosphere. Would definitely come back here!

room_title: Escape room "Mission's Breakout: the Ultimate Bank Heist" by Mission Escape Games in Los Angeles
review: We tried the Bank Heist room after a long anticipated wait and it did not disappoint!  We really enjoyed all the fun tech in the room, you really felt like your were in the front of a bank and then eventually in the back house of the bank.  Highly recommend Mission Escape games for al of their rooms, they are amazing!

room_title: Escape room "Mission's Breakout: the Ultimate Bank Heist" by Mission Escape Games in Los Angeles
review: I had so much fun here! I wanted to do something different to celebrate my friends, and this was perfect.,the fun starts when the clock does and literally doesn't stop. Don't second guess this place, just go lol. We did the bank heist and we'll be going back to do the haunted one.
